mapper.delete: delete FROM menu where id = #{id}; delete from role_menu where menu_id = #{id};
mapper.select: select m.code from menu m left join role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join role r on r.id = rm.role_id where ur.user_id =#{id} and r.enable = 1 and m.menu_type <> 'BUTTON'

select m.* from menu m left join role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join role r on r.id = rm.role_id where ur.user_id =#{id} and r.enable = 1 and m.type <> 'BUTTON' order by m.sord asc
select m.* from menu m where m.type <> 'button' order by m.sort asc
